title: Sports: Judo (Usefulness 1)
description: Traveler usefulness 1/10 phrases for the Judo subcategory within Sports. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: Judo teaches not only martial techniques, but also spiritual lessons of good manners and respect.
cards.romaji: J.d no oshie wa, bujutsu dake denaku, seishinmen ya reigi nimo oyobimasu.
cards.japanese: 柔道の教えは、武術だけでなく、精神面や礼儀にも及びます。
